ComicInfo.Penciller: Fred Kida,Herb Trimpe,Jack Keller,Jack Keller,Fred Kida
ComicInfo.Summary:
Marked for Capture!: Kid Colt saves Marshal Hoyt and his family from a group of outlaws who plan to kill the Marshal.
Desperate Hour!: Kid Colt stops Jesse Clune and his gang from attacking a wagon train and brings them to justice.
Out of Bounds!: Kid Colt stops the feud between the Dillon and Conroy families.
He Stands in the Shadow!: Frank Stanley, a doctor, tries to stop his brother Joe from being a gunfighter.
The Last Roundup!: After being ambushed and having his guns and saddle stolen, Kid Colt has to stop the outlaws from robbing the stage and get his possesions returned.
ComicInfo.Title: Marked for Capture!; Desperate Hour!; Out of Bounds!; He Stands in the Shadow!; The Last Roundup!
ComicInfo.AgeRating: Approved by the Comics Code Authority
